text: The lady on the counter was very helpful. They have a lunch buffet. Unlimited pizza for 7.99$. The food was good enough. They made special veggie pizza on demand for the buffet, which was pretty awesome. The staff was pretty welcoming. The â€¦More

text: I've been here many times with my work up here in Fairbanks, and have never been disappointed. Vicky, the hostess, is incredible! And the food has always been good. We go frequently for the lunch buffet and every experience has been great. â€¦More
